phrs.translation: 藏骨堂, 人骨教堂, 骨瓮
人骨教堂, 赛德莱克藏骨教堂
藏尸骨的罐头, 人骨教堂

sentences.sentence: The mention of a character on such a tomb or ossuary does not prove that the person really existed.
sentences.translation: 这样一个墓或骨瓮里提到的一个人，并不能证明这个人是真实存在。

sentences.sentence: Moreover, naming the brother as well as the father on an ossuary was "very unusual, " Lemaire says.
sentences.translation: 而且，据勒迈里说，在墓志铭中同时提及兄弟和父亲的名字显得“很不寻常”。

sentences.sentence: As such an expert, Altman was able to determine that the James ossuary inscription was clearly written by two different people.
sentences.translation: 奥特曼这样的专家，能够断定雅各骨瓮的铭文明显是由两个不同的人写的。
